fields.label: Flexible Single Column Section
fields.name: section_flexible_single_column
fields.instructions: Content blocks are placed in single column that is less than full width of content area. Multiple blocks are stacked.

fields.label: Flexible Double Column Section
fields.name: section_flexible_double_column
fields.instructions: Content blocks are placed in two columns that occupy the full content width. 1st column is on left, second on right.  If multiple blocks are placed in a column, they will stack in that column. All blocks in the left will stack above all blocks on the right for mobile.

fields.label: Team Grid Section
fields.name: section_team_grid
fields.instructions: Add as many team members as you like.  On desktop, they'll be displayed in a 3xn grid, and collapse to 1xn for mobile.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Use images of 704x808 for high resolution screens

fields.label: Flexible Content Block
fields.name: block_flexible_content
fields.instructions: Add any number of Content Block Components

sub_fields.label: Attach to Side
sub_fields.name: attach_to_side
sub_fields.instructions: The site design allows images to be "attached" to the side of the screen, breaking out of the container, and sticking to the side of the page.

fields.label: Shortcode Block
fields.name: block_shortcode
fields.instructions: Add a shortcode to the text field.  Should be of the form [shortcodename attribute='value']

fields.label: Slider
fields.name: slider
fields.instructions: This is the slider used in the page header

fields.label: Info Block
fields.name: info_block
fields.instructions: All elements in this group are optional, making it very versatile.

sub_fields.label: Tagline
sub_fields.name: tagline
sub_fields.instructions: large text appears above the body text. Used to grab attention.

sub_fields.label: Body Text
sub_fields.name: body_text
sub_fields.instructions: smaller text that may contain more detailed information.

sub_fields.label: Button
sub_fields.name: button
sub_fields.instructions: If the link title is blank, the button will be omitted.

fields.label: Code
fields.name: code
fields.instructions: Enter raw code here, and it will be inserted into the block.  Only use this for HTML and CSS. JavaScript will be removed.

fields.label: SVG
fields.name: svg
fields.instructions: Enter raw code for the SVG as well as a fallback image file.

sub_fields.label: Fallback Image
sub_fields.name: fallback_image
sub_fields.instructions: This image will be used on old browsers that don't support SVG

fields.label: Heading 1
fields.name: component_heading_1
fields.instructions: This is the page title style. H1 tag by default.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: You may include inline tags and classes

fields.label: Subheading 1
fields.name: component_subheading_1
fields.instructions: This is the page subtitle style. Uses a p tag.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: You may include inline tags and classes

fields.label: Heading 2
fields.name: component_heading_2
fields.instructions: This is the top-most page heading style. H2 tag by default.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: You may include inline tags and classes

fields.label: Subheading 2
fields.name: component_subheading_2
fields.instructions: This is the primary subheading style. Uses a p tag.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: You may include inline tags and classes

fields.label: Heading 3
fields.name: component_heading_3
fields.instructions: This is the second level page heading style. H3 tag by default.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: You may include inline tags and classes

fields.label: Subheading 3
fields.name: component_subheading_3
fields.instructions: This is the secondary subheading style. Uses a p tag.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: You may include inline tags and classes

fields.label: Heading 4
fields.name: component_heading_4
fields.instructions: This is the third level page heading style. H4 tag by default.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: You may include inline tags and classes

fields.label: Subheading 4
fields.name: component_subheading_4
fields.instructions: This is the tertiary subheading style. Uses a p tag.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: You may include inline tags and classes

fields.label: Heading 5
fields.name: component_heading_5
fields.instructions: This is the third level page heading style. H5 tag by default.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: You may include inline tags and classes

fields.label: Heading 6
fields.name: component_heading_6
fields.instructions: This is the third level page heading style. H6 tag by default.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: You may include inline tags and classes

fields.label: Body Content
fields.name: component_body_content
fields.instructions: A full featured wysiwyg editor. Allows for rich text content.

fields.label: Button
fields.name: component_button
fields.instructions: May be used to add buttons with button-like styling as well as Calls to Action that are more link-like.

fields.label: Width
fields.name: width
fields.instructions: How much of the available space should this block consume?

fields.label: Background Image
fields.name: background_image
fields.instructions: Overrides the background color when present

fields.label: Background Video
fields.name: background_video
fields.instructions: Overlays the background color and image.  Overlays slide backgrounds as well.  Background image or color may show for some screen sizes as bars to the sides or above/below. Use MP4 format with H264 codec. Not visible on mobile devices. As a background video, there will be no controls or sound.

sub_fields.label: Select Breakpoints
sub_fields.name: select_breakpoints
default_value: Uncheck an option to remove this element on the given screen size.

fields.label: Bar Style
fields.name: bar_style
fields.instructions: Select the type of bar we see to the far right of this section, if any

fields.label: Text Alignment
fields.name: text_alignment
fields.instructions: Defines how text is justified for this block.

fields.label: Background Color
fields.name: background_color
fields.instructions: Choose a color from the site palette

fields.label: Parallax
fields.name: parallax
fields.instructions: When true, background image will move at a different rate than the page when scrolling.  Does not apply to background video.

fields.label: Foreground
fields.name: foreground
fields.instructions: Make foreground text light or dark.

fields.label: Class
fields.name: class
fields.instructions: Classes are special tags added to HTML elements.  They may be used by your site developer to customize sections

fields.label: Semantic Heading (H1 default)
fields.name: semantic_heading_h1
fields.instructions: While Headings 1-6 define the style, this attribute defines the HTML (semantic) tag used.  Use if, semantically, this is a subhead.

fields.label: Semantic Heading (H2 default)
fields.name: semantic_heading_h2
fields.instructions: While Headings 1-6 define the style, this attribute defines the HTML (semantic) tag used.  Use if, semantically, this is a subhead.

fields.label: Semantic Heading (H3 default)
fields.name: semantic_heading_h3
fields.instructions: While Headings 1-6 define the style, this attribute defines the HTML (semantic) tag used.  Use if, semantically, this is a subhead.

fields.label: Semantic Heading (H4 default)
fields.name: semantic_heading_h4
fields.instructions: While Headings 1-6 define the style, this attribute defines the HTML (semantic) tag used.  Use if, semantically, this is a subhead.

fields.label: Semantic Heading (H5 default)
fields.name: semantic_heading_h5
fields.instructions: While Headings 1-6 define the style, this attribute defines the HTML (semantic) tag used.  Use if, semantically, this is a subhead.

fields.label: Semantic Heading (H6 default)
fields.name: semantic_heading_h6
fields.instructions: While Headings 1-6 define the style, this attribute defines the HTML (semantic) tag used.  Use if, semantically, this is a subhead.

fields.label: Position
fields.name: position
fields.instructions: How should the block as a whole be positioned in the space available?  Block must be set to a width that is less than the total available space, so position has no effect on a full-width block.

fields.label: Overlay
fields.name: overlay
fields.instructions: Usually a semi-transparent layer on top of background videos to help improve contrast with the foreground. Dark overlay darkens background, and Light lightens it.  Currently does not work for images.

fields.label: Columns
fields.name: columns
fields.instructions: Indicate the number of columns to be applied to an element.

fields.label: Attach
fields.name: attach
fields.instructions: Attach this to the left or right side of the screen.

fields.label: Add Left Border & Bullet
fields.name: add_left_border_bullet
fields.instructions: When selected, shifts content right, adds a border to the left of all but the last element, and adds a large yellow ball (bullet) at the top-left of the block.  The overall effect is that there is a ball and line linking consecutive block.

fields.label: Instructions
fields.message: Tracer images are added as background images to the body tag temporarily during development.  They allow the developer to quickly compare implemented elements with the design mockup, and make detailed adjustments to ensure they are close to pixel perfect.  Sometimes this method helps illustrate issues at the design level, and facilitate conversation around adjustments that can be made during development to compensate.

fields.label: Show Tracer
fields.name: show_tracer
fields.instructions: Select to show mockup in background (if available)
